name: African Development Bank (AfDB) Scholarships
description: Supports postgraduate students in various fields, including engineering, economics, and technology. The scholarship covers tuition fees, travel, and subsistence costs.
eligibility_criteria: Must be a national of an African member country. Applicants must have an excellent academic record and relevant professional experience.
fields_of_study: Engineering, Economics, Technology, and related fields

name: Zimbabwe Presidential Scholarship
description: Scholarships for Zimbabwean students pursuing undergraduate or postgraduate studies abroad. Covers tuition fees and living expenses.
eligibility_criteria: Must be a Zimbabwean national with high academic performance. Preference for students in STEM fields.
fields_of_study: STEM fields, but open to other disciplines

name: Chevening Scholarships
description: Funded by the UK Government, covering tuition fees, airfare, and a living allowance for one-year postgraduate studies in the UK.
eligibility_criteria: Applicants must be a citizen of a Chevening-eligible country and have at least two years of work experience.

name: The DAAD Scholarship Program
description: Offers scholarships for postgraduate studies and research in Germany. Includes full tuition, living expenses, and travel costs.
eligibility_criteria: Must be a graduate with a relevant academic background and professional experience.

name: Commonwealth Scholarships
description: Offers postgraduate scholarships to students from low and middle-income Commonwealth countries. Covers tuition fees and travel expenses.
eligibility_criteria: Must be a citizen of a Commonwealth country with an offer of admission at a UK university.

name: SACMEQ Scholarships
description: Supports education and research in Southern Africa. Focuses on improving the quality of education through funding for research and training.
eligibility_criteria: Must be a citizen of a SACMEQ member country with a focus on education.

name: Japanese Government (MEXT) Scholarships
description: Offers scholarships for undergraduate and postgraduate studies in Japan, including tuition, living expenses, and travel.
eligibility_criteria: Must be a citizen of a foreign country with a strong academic background.

name: Aga Khan Foundation International Scholarship Programme
description: Provides scholarships for postgraduate studies with a focus on development and education in East Africa, Central Asia, and South Asia.
eligibility_criteria: Must be from East Africa, Central Asia, or South Asia with strong academic performance and leadership potential.
